title: Error Creation New Folder (MSSQL Mode)
author: atscripter
body_snippet:
I was successfully able to connect to an MSSQL database but I get an SQL related [error](https://i.imgur.com/iE1ubOP.png) when attempting to create new a "connection" folder.

Running v1.77.1 (portable) on Windows 10 Enterprise 10.0.18363 Build 18363.

comments.snippet: What version of mRemoteNG are you running?
